title: Recovering from a coronary
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Ronald Bowie and Frank Milton
brief_description: Demonstrates a practical rehabilitation program for patients with coronary heart disease (devised at Otago University Medical School and the New Zealand School of Physiotherapy) which has produced encouraging results. Although intended mainly for medical audiences, the film offers advice which would well help to avoid or delay the premature onset of coronary heart disease in the population as a whole.
